title: Complete the square
text: Group and complete the square for $$x$$ and $$y$$ terms: $$4\left(x2-2x\right)+9\left(y2-8y\right)$$ and move constants.

title: Convert to standard form
text: After completing the square and dividing, you’ll get 4(x-1)2​+25(y-4)2​=1, which shows a vertical major axis.
